ivardefs.name: bodySite
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the device was used ( i.e. the target site).

ivardefs.name: device
ivardefs.desc: The details of the device used.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: An external identifier for this statement such as an IRI.

ivardefs.name: indication_
ivardefs.desc: Reason or justification for the use of the device.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Details about the device statement that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.

ivardefs.name: recordedOn
ivardefs.desc: The time at which the statement was made/recorded.

ivardefs.name: source
ivardefs.desc: Who reported the device was being used by the patient.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about.  Generally this will be active or completed.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient who used the device.

ivardefs.name: whenUsed
ivardefs.desc: The time period over which the device was used.
